infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes for accessing exclusive experiences and checking in at events.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may access the microphone for video recording features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access your photo library to save QR codes and event photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location services to provide location-based event information and directions.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: This app sends push notifications to keep you updated about race events, VIP experiences, and important announcements.
